snippet: The Nuclear Regulatory Commission has not given a license to build since 1978, a year before the Three Mile Island accident in Pennsylvania.
abstract: Nuclear Regulatory Commission is expected to decide to grant a license to build a nuclear reactor, for the first time since 1978; will vote on two new reactors at the Southern Company's plant near Augusta, Ga.
lead_paragraph: The Nuclear Regulatory Commission has not given a license to build since 1978, a year before the Three Mile Island accident in Pennsylvania.

headline.seo: Nuclear Commission Expected to Vote on New Reactors
headline.main: Regulatory Approval Is Expected for New Reactors in Georgia
headline.print_headline: Regulatory Approval Is Expected for New Reactors in Georgia
